x_nuvo_diag_probes.description:
When using the condition builder with "Between" operator as part of the Capital Plan Configurations or Capital Plan Scoring, any FX Currency field does not get proper values.
Steps to reproduce
1. Create a new Capital Plan Configuration.
2. Add a new Capital Plan Configuration Item.
3. Place x_nuvo_eam_clinical_devices in the table field.
4. Set Acquisition Cost to BETWEEN 0 AND 10000 in the Items to Include field.
5. Create a new Capital Plan with this Configuration.
x_nuvo_diag_probes.name: FX Currency Fields Issue - Clinical
x_nuvo_diag_probes.remediation: Change the operator to not be "Between" and use the "Greater than" and "Less than" operators instead.

sys_update_version.name: x_nuvo_diag_probes_e192d0641b7aa11088b2777e0a4bcb64
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_nuvo_diag_probes"><x_nuvo_diag_probes action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>When using the condition builder with "Between" operator as part of the Capital Plan Configurations or Capital Plan Scoring, any FX Currency field does not get proper values.

Steps to reproduce

1. Create a new Capital Plan Configuration.

2. Add a new Capital Plan Configuration Item.

3. Place x_nuvo_eam_clinical_devices in the table field.

4. Set Acquisition Cost to BETWEEN 0 AND 10000 in the Items to Include field.

5. Create a new Capital Plan with this Configuration.</description><healthcheck_type/><name>FX Currency Fields Issue - Clinical</name><order/><probe_type/><product_version/><remediation>Change the operator to not be "Between" and use the "Greater than" and "Less than" operators instead.</remediation><script><![CDATA[var util = new x_nuvo_diag.DiagnosticUtil();

var gr = new GlideRecord('x_nuvo_cp_capital_plan_configuration_item');

//Query the table for any records using the clinical devices table and the BETWEEN operator that has a capital configuration.
gr.addEncodedQuery('table=x_nuvo_eam_clinical_devices^conditionLIKEbetween^capital_plan_configISNOTEMPTY');
gr.addActiveQuery();
gr.query();

//If atleast one is found.
if(gr.next())
		util.handleOutput('A Capital Plan Configuration is using the "between" operator. Currently it does not work. Use the "greater than" and "less than" operators instead. Capital Plan Configuration: ' + gr.getDisplayValue('capital_plan_config'), 'warning', 'HTM Asset Management');
]]></script><sys_class_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>pierson.arnold@nuvolo.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-05-10 19:38:02</sys_created_on><sys_id>e192d0641b7aa11088b2777e0a4bcb64</sys_id><sys_mod_count>39</sys_mod_count><sys_name>FX Currency Fields Issue - Clinical</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Diagnostic Tool" source="x_nuvo_diag">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Diagnostic Tool">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes_e192d0641b7aa11088b2777e0a4bcb64</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Stefan.Popov@nuvolo.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-17 11:21:26</sys_updated_on><tool>diagnostic</tool></x_nuvo_diag_probes></record_update>
